course.title: Module 1: AI Fundamentals
course.lessonTitle: The Art of the Prompt: Instruction is Key
course.lessonContent1: When to use the Role+Task+Context structure: It's the best option for creative tasks or those needing a special point of view. For example: "Act as a screenwriter (Role), write a two-page scene (Task) where two detectives discover a key clue in an ancient library (Context)".
course.lessonContent2: When to use a direct question: To search for data or facts, a simple and direct question is faster and more efficient. A well-designed prompt is the difference between a generic answer and a brilliant solution.
course.question: Question 1/3: What is the best prompt structure for a creative task?
